dtedification.entry.arbormancy.entry: Nature's chaotic yet structured forces can be best exemplified by the $(thing)Tree$(). Their patterns and growth a snapshot of the forces at play through out its lifecycle.$(br2)With the help of the Arborists Corps, I have devised $(l:patterns/basic_arbormancy)$(item)several patterns$() that allow us to view and manipulate these $(thing)Trees$() on a deeper level.
dtedification.entry.arbormancy.explanati: Of course, with such patterns come new Iotas for referencing Nature's handiwork.$(li)$(bold)$(thing)Tree$() - an iota referencing its Species and JoCode.$(li)$(bold)Species$() - a variant of its Family with unique properties.$(li)$(bold)$(l:https://github.com/DynamicTreesTeam/DynamicTrees/wiki/JoCodes)JoCode$()- a mathematical way to represent tree growth in Base64.$(li)$(bold)Family$() - a set of alike Species with shared properties.
dtedification.page.basic_arbormancy.get_: Attempts to get the $(l:basics/arbormancy)Tree$() at the position.
Take a position and a radius and gets a list of $(l:basics/arbormancy)Trees$() within the zone.
dtedification.page.arbormancy_spells.tra: Given a $(l:basics/arbormancy)Tree$() and a position, attempt to transform the tree at the position into the given $(l:basics/arbormancy)Species$().
